extendedIngredients.name: cooked rice
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2 c rice, cooked and cooled (any kind)

extendedIngredients.name: veggie mix
extendedIngredients.originalString: 1 c frozen pea & carrot/veggie mix, steamed

recipes.title: Easy Chicken Fried Rice

winePairing.pairingText: Chardonnay, Pinot Noir, and Sauvignon Blanc are my top picks for Chicken. White meat is typically paired with white wine as to not overpower the flavor of the meat, so chardonnay and sauvignon blanc are safe choices. Chicken prepared with a tomato sauce or certainly a red wine sauce can and should be served with a red like a pinot noir. One wine you could try is Buddha Kat Winery Chardonnay. It has 4 out of 5 stars and a bottle costs about 25 dollars.

productMatches.title: Buddha Kat Winery Chardonnay
productMatches.description: We barrel ferment our Chardonnay and age it in a mix of Oak and Stainless. Giving this light bodied wine modest oak character, a delicate floral aroma, and a warming finish.

recipes.instructions: In a large skillet or wok heat the oil and cook the onion until tender.Add the cooled rice and cook for about 3 minutes, then stir to cook the other side.Add the soy sauce and honey, stir to coat the rice.Stir in the chicken, veggies and fried egg.Cook for another 3-5 minutes until all ingredients are warm.Serve immediately.Store leftovers in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.

steps.step: In a large skillet or wok heat the oil and cook the onion until tender.
Add the cooled rice and cook for about 3 minutes, then stir to cook the other side.
Add the soy sauce and honey, stir to coat the rice.Stir in the chicken, veggies and fried egg.Cook for another 3-5 minutes until all ingredients are warm.
Serve immediately.Store leftovers in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
